name: Simplex Runner
description:
Are you addictive to challenging 2D platformer games? If so then "Complexity" is a must try. Filled with a dynamically changing level. The path ahead is extremely dangerous, filled with traps that are just waiting to tear you apart. The level of the game is design to progressively be more difficult and complex along the path ahead. How  long can you survive?. it will not be easy. Good luck.

Feature:

  •  Several Different Languages Including: 
    • English
    • Spanish
    • Portuguese
    • French
  • Progress Saving System
